title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Corporate L&D Program Evaluation and Mathematics Education Application Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design and mathematics education experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Design tools to evaluate the effectiveness of L&D programs using mixed methodologies.
Develop an evaluation framework for a mathematics education program based on Kirkpatrick’s Four-Level Model (Reaction, Learning, Behavior, Results).
Analyze data collected in mobile microlearning environments to propose improvements for instructional strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
